testCaseName: Verify that a project name with more than 160 characters cannot be created

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Limit Of Characters in Project Name

name: Verify that a project name with more than 160 characters cannot be created

description: This test case is to verify that the creation of a new project has a character limit in the name input.
